title: Trump threatens Venezuelan land strikes as tensions mount
shortDescription: There have been 21 U.S. military strikes against Venezuelan vessels since September, with 83 casualties, all without Congress’ approval or oversight.

title: Republican Matt Van Epps wins TN election
shortDescription: Republican Matt Van Epps avoided an upset and won Tennessee's 7th Congressional District. What does this mean for President Donald Trump and the GOP?

title: The moment US Capitol Christmas tree lights up
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson and other members of Congress participated in the Capitol Christmas tree lighting ceremony.

title: Trump claims he's fighting drug traffickers
shortDescription: Naming a group as a Specially Designated Global Terrorist gives Trump the authority to enact sanctions, not to kill in international waters.

title: See the US Capitol Christmas Tree lighting ceremony
shortDescription: The National Christmas Tree Lighting is an annual tradition dating back to 1923 under President Calvin Coolidge.

title: Sabrina Carpenter blasts White House over song use
shortDescription: Sabrina Carpenter called a White House video using her song “evil and disgusting.”

title: Van Epps wins closely watched Tennessee special election
shortDescription: Matt Van Epps' victory over Democrat Aftyn Behn was a potential warning sign for Republicans less than a year from the 2026 midterm elections.

title: Dell CEO gives $6 billion toward Trump’s ‘accounts for babies’
shortDescription: Babies born during Donald Trump's current term will get a head start on building wealth. The Trump accounts got a donation from Michael Dell. When?

title: Trump looks ahead to 2028 GOP nominee: 'It's not going to be me'
shortDescription: President Trump said he won't be the Republican 2028 presidential nominee, predicting his GOP successor will be one of his Cabinet secretaries.

title: See previous White House holiday decor from Melania Trump, Jill Biden
shortDescription: First lady Melania Trump unveiled the White House Christmas decor this week. Jill Biden's decor from previous years have been resurfaced. See photos.

title: Trump calls affordability a ‘Democrat scam’
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called affordability a "Democrat scam" and a "con job."

title: 'Not the word I would choose,' Mike Johnson on Trump's R-word comment
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson tells reporters Trump's R-word comment about Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz was 'probably a spontaneous one' he wouldn't use.

title: Kristi Noem: 2 million fewer undocumented immigrants under Trump
shortDescription: Two million undocumented immigrants have left the US in the first year of Trump's second term, according to Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem.

title: Trump 'has our backs,' Hegseth says as he defends boat strikes
shortDescription: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth defended U.S. military strikes on alleged drug boats during a Cabinet meeting amid criticism from Congress.

title: Trump says Melania isn't thrilled about ballroom construction noise
shortDescription: President Trump said his wife, first lady Melania Trump, isn't thrilled about the noise from the construction of his massive White House ballroom.

title: Trump vows to overhaul Dulles airport with 'amazing' design
shortDescription: Trump and Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said they plan to overhaul Dulles airport near Washington, DC, which they said was "badly designed."

title: See moments from President Trump's December cabinet meeting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump held a meeting with members of his Cabinet at the White House on Dec. 2, 2025.

title: Al Gore urges Democrats to send a 'shock wave' in Tennessee race
shortDescription: The former vice president made a rare return to the campaign trail as he delivered an impassioned plea to Tennesseans to vote for Democrat Aftyn Behn.

title: Trump calls 'affordability' a 'Democrat scam' amid election losses
shortDescription: Trump touted tariffs and lower inflation at a Cabinet meeting where he called Democratic complaints about 'affordability' a 'scam.'

title: Donald Trump and when it's time to get an MRI
shortDescription: The White House released a statement on Dec. 1 from President Donald Trump's physician regarding his MRI scan. Here's what to know about the test.
